baptize.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to perform the ceremony of baptism on someone
baptize.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to accept someone as a member of a particular Christian church by a ceremony of baptism
baptize.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He was baptized a Roman Catholic.
baptize.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to give a child a name in a baptism ceremony
